title: When in DnD, the first text message from a star contact doesnt make a tone; subsequent messages do.
content:
I have noticed that when I am in DnD and receive a text message I do not get a sound notification. The second text does trigger the sound notification. I am not certain that it is only while DnD is active, though I think it is.
I am using the Pixel 3 on Google Fi, have the latest security updates, and am using a custom sound for the message tone. 
Any ideas?
